TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit CivicAddressResolver extends System.Object implements class System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver
Public NotInheritable Class CivicAddressResolver Implements ICivicAddressResolver

summary.span: 提供將座標位置解析成實體地址的功能。

span.span: Provides functionality for resolving a coordinate-based location to a civic address.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會提供實作的位置提供者提供座標和實體地址資料解析座標為基礎的位置實體地址。The class provides an implementation of that resolves a coordinate-based location to a civic address if the location provider provides both coordinates and civic address data. ## Examples 下列程式示範如何呼叫同步解析實體地址。The following program shows how to call to resolve a civic address synchronously. [!code-csharp[System.Device.Location.ResolveCivicAddressSync#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/system.device.location.resolvecivicaddresssync/cs/resolvecivicaddresssync.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Device.Location.ResolveCivicAddressSync#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/system.device.location.resolvecivicaddresssync/vb/resolvecivicaddresssync.vb#1)] 下列程式示範如何呼叫以非同步方式解析實體地址。The following program shows how to call to resolve a civic address asynchronously. [!code-csharp[System.Device.Location.ResolveCivicAddressSync#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/system.device.location.resolvecivicaddresssync/cs/resolvecivicaddresssync.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Device.Location.ResolveCivicAddressSync#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/system.device.location.resolvecivicaddresssync/vb/resolvecivicaddresssync.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何初始化 類別的新執行個體。The following example shows how to initialize a new instance of the class. ```csharp CivicAddressResolver resolver = new CivicAddressResolver(); ```

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Device.Location.CivicAddress ResolveAddress(class System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate coordinate) cil managed
Public Function ResolveAddress (coordinate As GeoCoordinate) As CivicAddress

abstract member ResolveAddress : System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate -> System.Device.Location.CivicAddress override this.ResolveAddress : System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate -> System.Device.Location.CivicAddress

param.name: coordinate
param.span: 包含解析到市鎮地址的位置。

span.span: The containing the location to resolve to a civic address.

summary.span: 從以緯度及經度為根據的位置同步解析出實體地址。

span.span: Synchronously resolves a civic address from a location based on latitude and longitude.

summary.span: 此呼叫會在解析位址時封鎖呼叫端執行緒的執行。

span.span: This call will block execution of the calling thread while the address is being resolved.

returns.span: 從 參數解析出來的實體地址。

span.span: The civic address that is resolved from the parameter.

returns.span: 如果無法解析該地址，則會傳回 。

span.span: is returned if the address cannot be resolved.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 位址解析作業完成時，會引發事件。The event is raised when the address resolve operation completes. 解決從實體地址`coordinate`參數由隸屬傳遞至事件處理常式的物件。The civic address that is resolved from the `coordinate` parameter is returned by the member of the object that is passed to the event handler. ## Examples 下列程式示範如何呼叫同步解析實體地址。The following program demonstrates how to call to resolve a civic address synchronously. [!code-csharp[System.Device.Location.ResolveCivicAddressSync#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/system.device.location.resolvecivicaddresssync/cs/resolvecivicaddresssync.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Device.Location.ResolveCivicAddressSync#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/system.device.location.resolvecivicaddresssync/vb/resolvecivicaddresssync.vb#1)]

exception.span: 未包含有效的緯度和經度。

span.span: does not contain a valid latitude and longitude.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ResolveAddressAsync(class System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate coordinate) cil managed
abstract member ResolveAddressAsync : System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate -> unit override this.ResolveAddressAsync : System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate -> unit

param.name: coordinate
param.span: 包含解析到市鎮地址的位置。

span.span: The containing the location to resolve to a civic address.

summary.span: 以非同步的方式解析根據緯度和經度之位置的地址。

span.span: Resolves an address asynchronously from a location that is based on latitude and longitude.

summary.span: 在解析地址的時候，該呼叫不會封鎖呼叫執行緒的執行。

span.span: The call does not block execution of the calling thread while the address is being resolved.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式示範如何呼叫以非同步方式解析實體地址。The following program shows how to call to resolve a civic address asynchronously. [!code-csharp[System.Device.Location.ResolveCivicAddressAsync#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/system.device.location.resolvecivicaddressasync/cs/resolvecivicaddressasync.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Device.Location.ResolveCivicAddressAsync#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/system.device.location.resolvecivicaddressasync/vb/resolvecivicaddressasync.vb#1)]

exception.span: 未包含有效的緯度和經度。

span.span: does not contain a valid latitude and longitude.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Event ResolveAddressCompleted As EventHandler(Of ResolveAddressCompletedEventArgs)

summary.span: 發生於呼叫 所啟動的地址解析作業完成時。

span.span: Occurs when the address resolution that was initiated by a call to completes.
